entry.title: Rocket Science Elective ‘verse
entry.summary:
Author: perksofimmortality (akahomie)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,145Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: A Modern Merlin Band AU.Merlin is a sexually frustrated astrophysicist with a few hang-ups related to a certain failed rock band in uni. Arthur is the spiteful, rebelling heir to a dynasty of classical musicians who wants nothing but to escape his father’s shadow. Gwaine is a stripper who’s maybe a bit (a lot) more passionate than most regarding the music he dances to. Gwen is the manager of her dad’s metronome factory, who secretly envies her brother for making it as a musical theater actor. Elena is an unorthodox, spitfire producer with something to prove, something her dad’s record label continues to sleep on.And this is the story of what would happen if these unlikely five were to start a band.

entry.title: storm the castle
entry.summary:
Author: iJoke

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,872Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 33

Summary: When Merlin first gets to Camelot and sees the king chop off someone’s head, he thinks that perhaps someone should do something about that. When he gets called by the dragon locked in the king’s basement, he thinks someone should do something about that pretty quickly. When the revenge of the executed man’s mother doesn’t take out two dozen innocent people as collateral damage to the king only because he intervenes, he remembers that he is, in fact, someone and is, according to Gaius, pretty powerful. So.~~Merlin takes over Camelot

entry.title: I Was Born From and With It
entry.summary:
Author: Jpg_26862

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,049Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 96

Summary: He had touched magic. He whipped around, his eyes feeling like they were popping out of his skull as he gaped at Arthur. He curled his magic around Arthur, searching, seeking out the sparks he had felt moments before. And there it was. Pulsing through his veins, heightening with his enjoyment of his hunt, quickening his reaction times, making him move faster, pushing him forward. Merlin couldn’t speak a single word, even as Arthur shoved him up against a wall and ordered some of the knights around him to throw him in the dungeons. The Crown Prince of Camelot had magic, and he didn’t even know it.With Merlin's arrival in Camelot, secrets long buried are revealed from every corner, and magic runs deep.

entry.title: Midnight Fire; The Last Dragonlord
entry.summary:
Author: NightimeCoyote

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,817Chapters: 20/40Kudos: 136

Summary: After Camleot is overrun by Morgause's army and Morgana is revealed to be a spy, Merlin is forced to free The Great Dragon. He gives him the answer he seeks yet takes something much larger, when the citadel is weak he kills Uther Pendragon.Arthur, overcome with loss, begins searching for the only man who can help him defeat The Great Dragon, the last Dragonlord. What they find, however, is much more than either Merlin or Arthur expected. In the shadow of that cruel night, Merlin must face the truth of his heritage and hide it from his best friend, the new king of Camelot.

entry.title: It's Not About You
entry.summary:
Author: naxsanie

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 67,285Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 213

Summary: People were missing overnight, outlying villages that reside seaside were wiped out without any trace. And it seems to be a pattern that would lead right to the small town near the labyrinth of Gedref. The only part of Camelot that touches the great sea of Meredor.The Prince, along with The Round Table Knight– and Merlin– as ever, are ready to protect people from this malevolence magic. They have to find out the hard way that they’re powerless against it. It went so far, to them being amongst the missing people. Captured to a Magical Kingdom on an island across the sea where they’re worship a long told prophecy of someone name Emrys.

entry.title: The Space Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: ReyloTrash2187

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,451Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 179

Summary: Arthur Pendragon has spent his whole life untouched—by kindness, by desire, or anything resembling real intimacy. It never mattered. Not until a certain annoying manservant came to Camelot—Merlin—who disregarded all strict royal etiquette and showed no restraint when it came to sudden, reckless displays of affection. Now, there’s something impossible in the space between them, something Arthur doesn’t know how to name—only that he aches to close the distance.*A slow-burn touched-starved Arthur Pendragon story.*Guys, there was only one bed.Guys, some obscure quest in the cold far-up mountains made them "huddle for warmth".Guys, they might give in to this farm fantasy of theirs.Can't I just put all the tropes in there?This fic is rated MSI for Maximum Self Indulgence.

entry.title: Of Legends and (Rugby) Kings
entry.summary:
Author: grlnxtdr29

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,312Chapters: 5/30Kudos: 17

Summary: The problem with Legends is that, over time, they are altered, misremembered, or forgotten all together. But some Legends are so great, they must be relived, again and again, until they get it right.Nick dreams only of being the Rugby King of Truham Grammar. Beyond that, he has no idea what he wants to do with his future. Until he meets a boy with curly hair, blue eyes, and dimples.Charlie dreams of Dragons, and Magick, of brave Knights, and a quest set before him, to bring back the olde ways, and set right the Legend that has been retold thousands of times. This time, he vows to set the record straight (Or not so straight.)Who knew their Destinies would collide?

entry.title: Merlin-natural
entry.summary:
Author: DrkValkyrie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,539Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Arthur has spent his whole life hunting the things that lurk in the dark. It's all he's ever known—rituals, monsters, weapons, salt lines, and scars. Merlin, on the other hand, is newer to the life, drawn into the hunt by tragedy. Together, they travel the backroads of America, chasing down the strange, the cursed, and the deadly. Both are searching for more than just the next case.Arthur chases the shadow of a father he could never live up to, and Merlin is tracking a darkness that tore his life apart.

entry.title: The Last Dragonheart
entry.summary:
Author: Ace_Teagirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,266Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 39

Summary: Dragonlords can easily be recognized by their lizard-like features. They sported scales on some parts of their body and had snake-like eyes. When the Great Dragon attacks Camelot, Arthur and Merlin set out to find Balinor, the last of the Dragonlords.But when Balinor dies on their way to Camelot, his gift is passed down to his son, Merlin. With the distinctive features of Dragonlords, there's no way for Merlin to hide his true nature from Arthur.

entry.title: Beneath the Surface
entry.summary:
Author: BlueGrassSax

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 150,874Chapters: 46/?Kudos: 606

Summary: Camelot is a lot bigger than the letter suggested it to be.The buildings here tower at three stories tall, sometimes even four, and that’s only in the lower town. The battlements alone leave trailing shadows over the roads, the stone and brick laid down who-knows how long ago.Merlin clutches Gaius’ letter close, looking down every now and then to recheck the directions. The roads are winding and narrow with more than a few dead-ends.His offer hangs just under the directions:"Mentor under me and I can teach you the control you seek – a physician’s apprentice is a noble trade not many young men have the opportunity to undertake. Do you understand?"Merlin didn’t understand at first, not until Hunith pressed a set of Will’s old clothes into confused hands. As tough as it is for a sheltered boy to saunter into a new city to take a position under an esteemed healer – not even considering the illegalities of the implied additional tutelage – it would be an impossibility for even the most headstrong of women.

entry.title: in every name
entry.summary:
Author: hansuckss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,270Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 9

Summary: “Are you vampires?” “What? No.” Merlin couldn’t help the small laugh of disbelief that slid up his throat, crossing his arms defensively over his chest.   “We’re not vampires,” Merlin said, then let out a small sigh before admitting, “we’re immortal.” Or; Merlin is immortal, doesn’t have magic, and the "Supernatural" exists. Arthur is just the great-grandson of someone Merlin once knew.

entry.title: merlin goes back in time
entry.summary:
Author: AndillScreamTillTheAirinmyLungsCollapse

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 781Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: I'd yet again failed to notice an important detail as a twig snaps under my boot, making the group of knights draw their blades. "Who's there? Show yourself!" The one that looks like him asks, its a stupid question really."That's a good question, friend. Who am I? It's not like I remember…" I speak with confidence but still trail off at the end, not to be heard by anyone but myself. As I wait for a response from him, the one that told the tavern story speaks up.
